java/liquibase/database/sql/RenameViewStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class RenameViewStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String oldViewName;
00010     private String newViewName;
00011 
00012     public RenameViewStatement(String schemaName, String oldViewName, String newViewName) {
00013         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00014         this.oldViewName = oldViewName;
00015         this.newViewName = newViewName;
00016     }
00017 
00018     public String getSchemaName() {
00019         return schemaName;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getOldViewName() {
00023         return oldViewName;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public String getNewViewName() {
00027         return newViewName;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00031         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00032             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00033         }
00034 
00035         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00036             return "exec sp_rename '" + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getOldViewName()) + "', " + database.escapeViewName(null, getNewViewName());
00037         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00038             return "RENAME TABLE " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getOldViewName()) + " TO " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getNewViewName());
00039         } else if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00040             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getOldViewName()) + " RENAME TO " + database.escapeViewName(null, getNewViewName());
00041         } else if (database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00042           return "RENAME VIEW " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getOldViewName()) + " TO " + database.escapeViewName(null, getNewViewName());
00043         }
00044 
00045         if (getSchemaName() != null && database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00046             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Cannot specify schema when renaming in oracle", this, database);
00047         }
00048 
00049         return "RENAME " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getOldViewName()) + " TO " + database.escapeViewName(null, getNewViewName());
00050     }
00051 
00052     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00053         return ";";
00054     }
00055 
00056     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00057         return !(database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00058         || database instanceof HsqlDatabase
00059         || database instanceof DB2Database
00060         || database instanceof CacheDatabase
00061         || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase);
00062     }
00063 }
